features: [⚡️ALL-IN-ONE GENTLE EXFOLIATING TONER PAD⚡️] Contains PHA, mild exfoliating ingredient, to delicately exfoliate dead skin cells, aiding in the reduction of blackheads, whiteheads, and breakouts.
[🌿FORMULATED WITH NATURAL INGREDIENTS🌿]: Has watery, non-sticky texture, and contains 77% Heartleaf Extract grown and haversted in Korea.
[⛅️CAN BE USED AM & PM, EVERYDAY⛅️] Perfect daily toner pad for instant soothing and enlarged pores, great for any skin types and especially sensitive skin.
[🌚HELPS SEBUM CONTROL🌚] Contains "Anti-Sebum P", potent ingredient including 4 plant-derived extracts, to reduce sebum and minimize pores.
[😎VIRAL ITEM IN KOREAN H&B STORES😎] Rave real reviews from our customers in Olive Young and Tiktok!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturising with an affordable price tag
reviews.reviewText: I've used it about 4x since receiving it. I used it similar to how one use a face mask. After wiping on the "textured" side of the pad, I placed 2-3 pads all over my face, special focus on eye bag area. It helps to reduce puffiness while also moisturising my face. I didn't even have to apply a separate moisturizer. This toner pad is an amazing esp when you're exposed to the chill winter winds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have been looking for a chemical exfoliant that isn't too strong. This one is lovely - very gentle but leaves my skin so so smooth. Texture significantly reduced after using 2x per week for 2 weeks. Will definitely repurchase in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth
reviews.reviewText: I feel like this toner pad has help me tremendously with my skin. After using this product, my skin feels smoother and it gently exfoliates my skin. I also like how the liquid is not sticky at all. It is light like water, but keeps the skin moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Promising Potential: ANUA Heartleaf 77 Toner Pad
reviews.reviewText: I've used the ANUA Heartleaf 77 Toner Pad in my daily skincare routine. While I haven't noticed a significant difference in my skin yet, I remain hopeful about its potential benefits.Gentle Exfoliation with PHA:Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) for gentle exfoliation is a feature that initially attracted me to these toner pads. They provide a non-abrasive way to slough off dead skin cells, promoting a smoother complexion over time. Although I haven't seen dramatic results yet, I appreciate the low pH formulation that aligns with my commitment to gentle daily exfoliation.Heartleaf Extract:Including heartleaf extract in these toner pads is intriguing, given its reputation for calming and soothing properties. While I haven't observed any immediate mild effects, I remain optimistic about this ingredient's long-term benefits to my skin's overall health.Convenient and Hygienic Packaging:The toner pads are conveniently packaged, ensuring each pad is saturated with the product and ready for use. This makes them easy to incorporate into my routine and maintains their freshness. The hygienic packaging adds to the overall user experience.Hopeful Expectations:Despite not witnessing a noticeable change in my skin, I am hopeful and understand that skincare products often take time to show results. I plan to continue using the ANUA Heartleaf 77 Toner Pads consistently, anticipating positive changes in the texture and appearance of my skin with prolonged use.Potential for Long-Term Benefits:Skincare is a journey, and some products, like the ANUA Heartleaf 77 Toner Pad, require patience to reveal their full potential. I appreciate that skincare results are often cumulative, and I remain optimistic about the long-term benefits this product may bring to my skin.In conclusion, while I haven't seen immediate changes, I remain hopeful about the ANUA Heartleaf 77 Toner Pad and its potential benefits for my skin. Patience is vital in skincare, and I'm eager to continue using these toner pads to see how they contribute to my complexion's overall health and radiance.
